root.name: Bone: The Great Cow Race
root.description: StoryThe great cowrace is about to begin. Do all kinds of things to end up wearing a cow suit!System RequirementsOS: Windows XP or VistaProcessor: 1.5GHz processorMemory: 256MB RAMGraphics: 32MB 3D-accelerated video card
